title.narrative: PREVENT OF EARLY ADOLESCENT AND ADOLESCENT PREGNANCY

description.narrative: By 2022, the Ministry of Health, the Office of the Public Prosecutor, the Ministry of Education and other service providers have models and strategies to prevent and provide specialized care for early adolescent and adolescent pregnancies, with a genderbased intercultural focus., which contributes to Cross Sectoral - Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices, Health And Development In Early Childhood And Adolescence, Health And Development In Early Childhood And Adolescence (Covid), Immunization Services As Part Of Primary Health Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being, Nutrition Of Adolescents And Women. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2022, children and adolescents in Ecuador exercise their right to a life free from violence and exploitation, with a focus on early childhood and adolescence, including in emergency situations.

participating-org.narrative: FACULTAD LATINOAMERICANA DE CIENCIAS SOCIALES FLACSO

mailing-address.narrative: Av. Amazonas 2889 y La Granja Edificio Naciones Unidas Quito

sector.narrative: Adolescent health and wellbeing (including sexual and reproductive health)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2022, the Ministry of Health, the Office of the Public Prosecutor, the Ministry of Education and other service providers havemodels and strategies to prevent and provide specialized care for early adolescent and adolescent pregnancies, with a genderbasedintercultural focus.

description.narrative: UNICEF CO continues providing technical assistance to ministries, advocating for adequate measures to prevent early pregnancy in draft laws, and participating in initiatives to promote prevention among adolescents with the Ministry of Health. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:18/01/2022

title.narrative: Advocacy strategy designed to promote increase of the national Government budget to prevention and attention of adolescent pregnancy(67209)

target.value: 2022:Systematization of the implementation of the strategy and plan for future years

actual.value: 2021:As part of the advocacy strategy, UNICEF along with UNFPA and other UN Agencies are part of the advisory board for the intersectoral committee to prevent early pregnancy.

title.narrative: Ministry of Heath has established standards for adolescent friendly health services, including a protocol to attend teenage pregnancies under 14 years old.(67210)

target.value: 2022:Protocol finalized and adopted by Mnistry ol Health
